title: Specifics....
body: I can't make a post or comment in "Team Recruitment" because I have to be level 6? What does that even mean. I am just trying to find people to play with.

replies.body: It looks like your account was sync'd to the boards initially, so it didn't know that you are actually level 19.  Everything looks fine now, so you should be able to post in Team Recruitment.  Happy posting!
Does anyone want to start a team? Or want to help me figure out why I can't make posts/comment in "Team Recruitment" ?
